Title: Kuo-Na Quillpaw
Description:
Most of the duels within the Cradle take place between two trainees. Rarely, when a trainee exhibits a rare amount of skill, they will have an opportunity to duel their trainer.

Today, you duel against Kuo-Na. She will be waiting for you at the Pedestal of Hope.
PortraitGiverText: Your first sparring match against your trainers!
